channel.title: Everywhere I look Religion is being talked about
channel.description:
Let's change that.
*AHEM*
Let's see what their is to talk about.
How about favorite quotes? from either famous or unfamous people.
1 rule. [s]NO RELIGION[/s]

item.title: Everywhere I look Religion is being talked about
item.dc:creator: @frozon566 frozon566
item.description:
@frozon566 wrote:

Now we got 2 religion threads?

@OP:

“Jesus waited three days to come back to life. It was perfect! If he had only waited one day, a lot of people wouldn’t have even heard he died. They’d be all, “Hey Jesus, what up?” and Jesus would probably be like, “What up? I died yesterday!” and they’d be all, “Uh, you look pretty alive to me, dude…” and then Jesus would have to explain how he was resurrected, and how it was a miracle, and the dude’d be like “Uhh okay, whatever you say, bro…” And he’s not gonna come back on a Saturday. Everybody’s busy, doing chores, workin’ the loom, trimmin’ the beard, NO. He waited the perfect number of days, three. Plus it’s Sunday, so everyone’s in church already, and they’re all in there like “Oh no, Jesus is dead”, and then BAM! He bursts in the back door, runnin’ up the aisle, everyone’s totally psyched, and FYI, that’s when he invented the high five. That’s why we wait three days to call a woman, because that’s how long Jesus wants us to wait… True story.”

-Barney Stinson

Read full topic

19 Yet she became more and more promiscuous as she recalled the days of her youth, when she was a prostitute in Egypt. 20 There she lusted after her lovers, whose genitals were like those of donkeys and whose emission was like that of horses.
Ezekiel 23: 19-20

item.description:

The reason people are starting to talk so much about religion is because the end draws near. Sinners! Repent while you can, or burn in hell for evermore!

The end isn’t near. All the chaos in the world is just fuel for the revolution…

item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“TheCyberMan, post:2, topic:440724”]If people want to talk about it on the General Discussion section, let them.[/quote]If everywhere to you is the General Discussion, well, there may or may not be problems with your life

“Eyyyup” -Big Macintosh

-Anything Cr1TiKaL (Penguinz0) has said.

item.source: Everywhere I look Religion is being talked about

item.title: Everywhere I look Religion is being talked about
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

[quote=“TheCyberMan, post:10, topic:440724”][quote author=Wet Dreamss link=topic=543397.msg3982764#msg3982764 date=1335484994]

If people want to talk about it on the General Discussion section, let them.

Who said that? I’ve never seen it before.

/Don’t troll me asshole.
[/quote]
You gave your statement and I gave mine. I don’t mean I want to shove religion down your throat, but if it interests people, I see nothing wrong with sharing viewpoints. There’s no need to get so pissed off, Wet Dreamss.[/quote]
Did I sound pissed off? Sorry, I don’t get mad at the internet unlike you.

Acorn_:

[quote=“God”]Let there be light!

Matthew 4.17 ESV:

Repent, for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.[/quote]

ahaha, you actually made me laugh.

[quote=“kronixz, post:6, topic:440724”]nao the kernal… you ever see that south park episode? lmao.

hell yeah, that shit is sweet.

This is Boston Market gravy. DUDE WHAT THE FUCK. *pulls gun* Don't fuck with me man.

[quote author=vManlyMan link=topic=543397.msg3982794#msg3982794 date=1335486570]
Religion is a part of this world. You have to deal with people trying to shove their religion down your throat just like me, and everyone else.

This is still a forum that has nothing to do with religion, I don’t get on mopar to see religion. anyways, I like that Marilyn Monroe quote

Read full topic

If people want to talk about it on the General Discussion section, let them.
[/quote]
Who said that? I’ve never seen it before.

You gave your statement and I gave mine. I don’t mean I want to shove religion down your throat, but if it interests people, I see nothing wrong with sharing viewpoints. There’s no need to get so pissed off, Wet Dreamss.
